Aaron Gilmore —

Digital design & front-end development

Student's Guide to the Internet —

2016–present Design, development, research

Student's Guide to the Internet is a collection of design resources for students; books, articles, people, and events relating to technology & design.

Website

Designed in Sketch. Built using Sassline; a framework for setting typography to a baseline grid on the web and Jekyll; a static blog platform used with GitHub Pages.
